CustomField.description: Calculates Day of the week starting with Sunday
CustomField.formula: CASE(MOD( DATEVALUE( Created_date__c ) - DATE(1900,1,7) , 7) , 0 , 'Sunday' , 1 , 'Monday' , 2 , 'Tuesday' , 3 , 'Wednesday' , 4 , 'Thursday' , 5, 'Friday' , 6 , 'Saturday' , 'No Day Found')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Display the Day of the week as example (Monday)
CustomField.label: Day of the Week
